name: YOUR(cursed)SHOP
description:
Manage your shop, barter with frugal customers, and make enough dosh to pay off your life debt.

Build up your shop, town, and friendships through a complex dialogue and item  system.

Discover hidden resources, items, and stories while exploring the countryside.

The status of the current demo is to stress test the core mechanics (namely bartering and dialogue) while also finding any bugs that haven't been squashed yet. This demo is only 5-10 minutes long, does not represent the final product, and is missing many core features that will be added once polished enough. To see newly released and under work feature please visit the discord.

Join our discord to discuss the game and help us improve!

Follow us on twitter for regular updates!

Check out the official website for more information!
